properties.areaDesc: Southern Centre; Blair; Clearfield; Northern Centre; Cambria; Mifflin; Huntingdon
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 8:45PM EST by NWS State College PA
properties.description:
HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which
can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile.

LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 840 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was
along a line extending from Pleasant Gap to Port Matilda to near
Prince Gallitzin State Park and moving east at 25 MPH. The band is
moving slowly to the south.

LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE...
State College, Tyrone, Park Forest Village, Northern Cambria,
Boalsburg, Pleasant Gap, Stormstown, Lemont, Bald Eagle, Houserville,
Warriors Mark, Patton, Pine Grove Mills, Milroy, Hastings, Centre
Hall, Tipton, Carrolltown, Ramblewood and Port Matilda.

This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 43 to 81, as well as
Route 322 from State College to Lewistown.

SAFETY INFO...
Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be
prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra
time to reach your destination.

NWSheadline: A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF NORTHERN CENTRE... CLEARFIELD...BLAIR...CAMBRIA...HUNTINGDON...MIFFLIN...AND SOUTHERN CENTRE COUNTIES
